edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.dbselection.util
Class ContentSummaryHandler

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
        |
        +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.dbselection.util.ContentSummaryHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class ContentSummaryHandler
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler

This class represents a content summary of a collection by storing all terms and their doc-freq in a HashMap map, with the term as key, the doc-freq as value.

it adds up doc-freq for terms that shows up in more than one field. So, the actual doc-freq stored is an approximation

To use this class, call it's index method
